block.p: Why Crime Rate Is Dropping New statistics are helping criminologists resolve a contentious mystery: why violent crime has dropped seven straight years after an upsurge in the 1980's. Page A18.

Smallest of Octuplets Dies The smallest of the octuplets born to a Houston couple on Dec. 20 has died from heart and lung failure. The other seven babies were in critical condition. Page A18.

Giants' Season Ends The Giants, their post-season hopes over before their game began, and the playoff-bound Jets both won their final regular-season games. The Jets' 12 victories were a team record. SportsMonday, page D1.

N.B.A. Says Offer Is Its Last The league presented what it called its final offer to the basketball players union, and league officials said they had no hope of reaching an agreement in time to save the N.B.A. season. SportsMonday, page D1.
